mirage-community-messages-header: Header for the community messages module.
mirage-interface-messages-module-edit-th: Text used for the edit link to edit the community messages module content. It is only shown to users who actually can edit the message.
mirage-page-actions: Header for the page actions in the right rail. This header is for screen readers and won't be shown to regular users.
mirage-action-addsection:
Button label for the edit button when viewing a talk page the user can edit.
{{Identical|Add topic}}
mirage-userpage:
Label used for the personal tools link to the user page.
{{Identical|User page}}
Parameters:
* $1 - username, used for GENDER
mirage-footer-places:
Header for the places category of the footer. It contains links to the privacy policy, about page and the disclaimer.
{{identical|Place}}
mirage-footer-feeds: Header for the feeds category of the footer. It contains links to the RSS feeds for the page.
mirage-footer-info: Header for the footer icons. This header is for screen readers and won't be shown to regular users.
mirage-expand-submenu: Display text for the sub menu icon in the site navigation. This message is for screen readers.
mirage-talkpage: Text used for the link to the user's talk page.
mirage-user-tools: Header for the right rail module containing all user toolbox links.
mirage-no-new-messages: Message shown when the user has no new messages.
mirage-notifications:
Display text for the notifications icon displayed when [[mw:Extension:Echo]] is not available. This message is for screen readers and won't be shown to regular users.
{{Identical|Notification}}
mirage-page-tools: Header for the right rail module with the toolbox tools for the current page.
mirage-recent-changes-module:
Header for the right rail module with a small list of recent changes
{{Identical|Recent changes}}
mirage-more:
Button label for the edit button dropdown. This message is for screen readers and won't be shown to regular users.
{{Identical|More}}
mirage-more-recent-changes: Text used for the link to Special:RecentChanges in the recent changes right rail module.
mirage-toggle-right-rail:
'''For RTL languages, replace "right" with "left".'''

Label for the button that toggles the right rail. This message will be shown as a tooltip and read by screen readers.

See also
* {{msg-mw|vector-action-toggle-sidebar}}
prefs-mirage-max-width-label: Label for the radiobuttons that control the limit on the width of the content.
prefs-mirage-max-width: Label for the option to always limit the width of the content.
prefs-mirage-partial-max-width: Label for the option to only limit the width of the content of articles
prefs-mirage-no-max-width: Label for the option to never limit the width of the content.
prefs-mirage-show-right-rail:
'''For RTL languages, replace "right" with "left".'''

Label for the option to display the right rail.
prefs-mirage-toc: Label for the radiobuttons that control the placement of the table of contents
prefs-mirage-toc-legacy: Label for the option to place the table of contents in the article body
prefs-mirage-toc-hybrid:
'''For RTL languages, replace "right" with "left".'''

Label for the option to place the table of contents in the article body and in a right rail module
prefs-mirage-toc-right-rail-only:
'''For RTL languages, replace "right" with "left".'''

Label for the option to place the table of contents in a right rail module
mirage-toggle-toc: Label for the button that toggles the visibility of the table of contents in the right rail module
mirage-wordmark-file-warning: Warning message displayed on [[:File:Mirage-wordmark.svg]] or [[:File:Mirage-wordmark.png]] when that file is used as the wordmark.
